item.title: Evaluating Model Performance: Recall, Precision, F1 Score, and Kappa using Tidyverse
item.dc:creator: Øyvind Bugge Solheim
ChatGPT (Ghost Writer)
item.description: This post discusses various metrics for evaluating model performance in R, including recall, precision, F1 score, and kappa statistics, using tidyverse and pipes with a unified dataset approach.. Additionally, we highlight the importance of correctly specifying factor levels to ensure valid metric calculations..

item.title: Adding Text to ggplots with Lines and Scatterplots
item.dc:creator: Øyvind Bugge Solheim
ChatGPT (Ghost Writer)
item.description: This post explains how to add text annotations to ggplots with lines and scatterplots using ggplot2 in R..

item.title: Forstå YAML-headeren i et Quarto- eller Rmarkdown-dokument
item.dc:creator: Øyvind Bugge Solheim
ChatGPT (Ghost Writer)
item.description: En gjennomgang av YAML-headeren brukt i et Quarto eller RMarkdown-dokument, med fokus på tilpasninger for norsk språk og spesifikke formatteringskrav..

item.title: Handling Norwegian Characters (æ, ø, å) in R
item.dc:creator: Øyvind Bugge Solheim
item.description: This post explains how you can set the locale in R to handle Norwegian characters (æ, ø, å) properly.
